trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter" />).
trans-unit.target: 做為其他格式子的基底類別所使用的抽象類別 (例如 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10FeedFormatter" />)。

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是抽象的，而且無法直接具現化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter" /> 執行個體建立 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> 必須有一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 與它關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 然後 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> 才可將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 寫出至 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> is by using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 將 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 與 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeedFormatter> 產生關聯的唯一方法是使用此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: An XML reader to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的 XML 讀取器。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: 驗證指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 是否包含有效的新聞訂閱摘要。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the XML reader contains a valid syndication feed, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 讀取器包含有效的新聞訂閱摘要，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method verifies whether the start element name and namespace match the start element name and namespace of the RSS 2.0 or Atom 1.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會驗證開始項目名稱和命名空間是否與 RSS 2.0 或 Atom 1.0 規格的開始項目名稱和命名空間相符。
